column4: BRIEF-AB Announces April 30, 2018 Assets Under Management
column6: * ALLIANCEBERNSTEIN HOLDING LP - PRELIMINARY ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT DECREASED TO $538 BILLION DURING APRIL 2018 FROM $549 BILLION AT END OF MARCH Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
* ALLIANCEBERNSTEIN HOLDING L.P. ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER RESULTS
column7: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.68 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
column8: * TOTAL ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 WERE $549.5 BILLION, DOWN $5.0 BILLION, OR 0.9%, FROM DECEMBER 31, 2017
column9: * TOTAL NET OUTFLOWS WERE $2.4 BILLION IN Q1, VERSUS NET INFLOWS OF $4.2 BILLION IN PREVIOUS QUARTER
column10: * QTRLY GAAP NET REVENUES $867.8 MILLION VERSUS $764.9 MILLION
column11: * INSTITUTIONAL CHANNEL Q1 NET OUTFLOWS OF $2.8 BILLION COMPARED TO NET INFLOWS OF $3.0 BILLION IN Q4 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
